snippet: Mississippi is asking a federal appeals court to uphold a state law requiring doctors at abortion clinics to obtain privileges to admit patients to local hospitals.
lead_paragraph: Mississippi is asking a federal appeals court to uphold a state law requiring doctors at abortion clinics to obtain privileges to admit patients to local hospitals.

headline.main: Mississippi: State Asks Full Court to Reconsider Abortion Ruling
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: State Asks Full Court To Reconsider Abortion Ruling
